subject: Vulnerability with the DesignThemes Core Features plugin
preview: Hello Andy, We are writing to you today to notify you about a security vulnerability  discovered in the *DesignThemes Core Features* plugin. We detected the plugin on one or more of your websites:  ?

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli marked as Closed
Workflow **Vulnerability assigned to Manuel** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hello Andy, We are writing to you today to notify you about a security
vulnerability
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWukL6eYjGRlUZGKIx7PMBk87YMncduWnv10oIfv-2BwKSlHstTytwUU1yvPV3-2B4YoDs-2FplhyvUaY-2BK1ggvJSpoJ1Gs-3DHDT-_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKCrBJBffML8ZNda1ulG-2FGW6FxRkbmhwysIK-2FaiFfndDLYnN5cN4hDqTCH6fUJPM-2F56Upr4B71Qxf7ZDfglIqalTnl2BYtXczm9YJfZNd7U6eBg5kV8G55xtxZrjzNTY4roI84S85ujtG0JFhlaspV3iUhplqNyNoN481MoQfajmSOHCgma-2FRPNYVRi8ru0vABq9YHmDXv7l1nD7JC-2FBjMWN>
discovered in the *DesignThemes Core Features* plugin. We detected the
plugin on one or more of your websites:

• thompsonroaddental

*You can ignore this message if you have already deactivated DesignThemes
Core Features.*

The plugin has a vulnerability that makes it possible for *unauthenticated
visitors* to view files on the server, potentially exposing sensitive
information.

*There is no fix available.*

No fix is currently available, so we recommend deactivating the plugin
immediately. You can reactivate and update the plugin if the author issues
a fixed version in the future.

To deactivate the plugin, log in to the Admin section of your site, go to
Plugins > Installed Plugins > DesignThemes Core Features, and click the
“Deactivate” link under the plugin name.

This vulnerability may exist in both live and staging environments. We
recommend that both be checked and that the plugin be deactivated.

We detected this vulnerability on March 7th, 2025, at 12:09 PM UTC, but due
to the time difference between scanning for vulnerabilities and sending
notifications, you may have already removed the plugin.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact our support team.

Thank you for being a Kinsta client!


ID: designthemes-core-features


The Kinsta Team
You are receiving this email because you have an account at Kinsta.
